extension.summary: [COLOR red]No[/COLOR] [COLOR yellow]-[/COLOR] [COLOR turquoise]Name[/COLOR] Movies, TV Shows and LiveTV
extension.description: Watch movies and TV shows in high quality! Please note that this addon is not an official part of the Kodi media player and is therefore not to be mentioned within Kodi's official support channels. This addon has nothing to do with the media player itself, nor its intended use, it is simply a third party plugin which has been added to your system. [COLOR red]No[/COLOR] [COLOR yellow]-[/COLOR] [COLOR turquoise]Name[/COLOR] by [COLOR red][B]C0LD[/B][/COLOR][COLOR turquoise][B]FIRE[/B][/COLOR]
extension.disclaimer: [COLOR red][B]The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.[/B][/COLOR]
